39.heading: DC Comics.
39.title: Crime Time
39.author: written by Bill Matheny ; illustrated by Terry Beatty, Christopher Jones.
notes: "Originally published in single magazine form as The Batman Strikes! 1-5"
"Watch the hit series on WB Kids"

Summary (from OCLC): For the Dark Knight Detective, every night is crime time and there are no commercial breaks during his fight for justice!. Tune in as the Batman takes on all comers in these action packed tales: Penguin rising, City of bats, Outlaw and disorder, Without a chance, Deadly partner.

54.heading: DC Comics.
54.title: DC Comics' The New Teen Titans : in cooperation with the President's Drug Awareness Campaign
54.author: Marv Wolfman, writer ; Ross Andru, penciller ; Joe Giella, inker.
notes: Letter from Nancy Reagan on the inside cover.

There were three comics featuring the New Teen Titans as part of anti-drug education. The first had a white cover background, the second (this one) a dark blue cover background and the third an orange cover background.
